New Records: LeBron James recorded a triple-double with 21 points, 12 rebounds, and 13 assists
Key Match Events: LeBron James barrelled to the rim for a bucket in the second quarter
James collided with teammate Rui Hachimura as they went to grab a rebound, but returned after a timeout and responded with two key buckets for LA
Pre-Game Insights: This season, facilitating has been LeBron James' primary task as he plays a more hybrid point-forward role for the Lakers
Post-Match Reflections: Skip Bayless praised LeBron James, calling him the most durable superstar ever, crediting his longevity
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Lakers improved to 5-4 this season with the win
LeBron James is in his 22nd year in the NBA
James is averaging 24.0 points, 6.9 rebounds, and 7.5 assists so far this season
Others: The Lakers will host the Toronto Raptors at home next, followed by another game against the Memphis Grizzlies
